title: [High School Physics] Assistance in finding the inner radius of a ...
body: Full Volume of straw (including outer radius): V = π Ro 2 H Volume of liquid inside straw (using inner radius): V = π Ri 2 H Equation relating inner and outer radii, where x is the thickness of the cylinder of plastic of the straw: Ri + x = Ro x = Ro - Rx Volume of plastic making up straw: V = π (Ro - Ri) 2 H
